swords-dance.effect_entries: Raises the user's Attack by two stages.
swords-dance.flavor_text_entries:
A dance that in­
creases ATTACK.

bind.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.

vine-whip.flavor_text_entries:
Whips the foe with
slender vines.

headbutt.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
headbutt.flavor_text_entries:
An attack that may
make foe flinch.

fire-punch.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
fire-punch.flavor_text_entries:
A fiery punch. May
cause a burn.

thunder-punch.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
thunder-punch.flavor_text_entries:
An electric punch.
It may paralyze.

ice-punch.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target.
ice-punch.flavor_text_entries:
An icy punch. May
cause freezing.

tackle.flavor_text_entries: Trifft das Ziel mit vollem Körpereinsatz.

string-shot.effect_entries: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.
string-shot.flavor_text_entries:
A move that lowers
the foe's SPEED.

snore.effect_entries: Only usable if the user is sleeping.  Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
snore.flavor_text_entries:
An attack useable
only while asleep.

bug-bite.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately.

If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect.

If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move's damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.
bug-bite.flavor_text_entries:
The user bites the
foe. If the foe is
holding a Berry, the
user eats it and
gains its effect.

electroweb.effect_entries: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.
electroweb.flavor_text_entries:
Attrape l’ennemi dans un filet électrique.
Baisse aussi la Vitesse de l’ennemi.

harden.effect_entries: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.

iron-defense.effect_entries: Raises the user's Defense by two stages.
iron-defense.flavor_text_entries:
Hardens the body’s surface
to sharply raise DEFENSE.

gust.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.

If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
gust.flavor_text_entries:
Whips up a strong
gust of wind.

whirlwind.effect_entries:
Switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon selected at random.  Wild battles end immediately.

Doesn't affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
whirlwind.flavor_text_entries:
Blows away the foe
& ends battle.

fury-attack.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

take-down.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
take-down.flavor_text_entries:
A tackle that also
hurts the user.

fly.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  User flies high into the air for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, gust, hurricane, sky uppercut, smack down, thunder, twister, and whirlwind still hit the user normally.  gust and twister also have double power against the user.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during the immune turn.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

body-slam.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
body-slam.flavor_text_entries:
An attack that may
cause paralysis.

slam.flavor_text_entries:
Slams the foe with
a tail, vine, etc.

wrap.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.

pay-day.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user's level in extra money for each time this move was used.
pay-day.flavor_text_entries:
Throws coins. Gets
them back later.

double-kick.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.

sand-attack.effect_entries: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

horn-drill.effect_entries:
Inflicts damage equal to the target's max HP.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This move's accuracy is 30% plus 1% for each level the user is higher than the target.  If the user is a lower level than the target, this move will fail.

Because this move inflicts a specific and finite amount of damage, endure still prevents the target from fainting.

The effects of lock on, mind reader, and no guard still apply, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  However, they will not give this move a chance to break through detect or protect.

horn-attack.flavor_text_entries:
An attack using a
horn to jab.

double-slap.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

mega-punch.flavor_text_entries:
A powerful punch
thrown very hard.

double-edge.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
double-edge.flavor_text_entries:
A tackle that also
hurts the user.

thrash.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to attack with this move for 2–3 turns,selected at random.  After the last hit, the user becomes confused.

safeguard does not protect against the confusion from this move.

leer.effect_entries: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.
leer.flavor_text_entries:
Le lanceur fait les gros yeux à l’ennemi pour
l’intimider et baisser sa Défense.

stomp.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.

Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used minimize since entering the field.
stomp.flavor_text_entries:
An attack that may
cause flinching.

jump-kick.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage. If this move misses, is blocked by protect or detect, or has no effect, the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP rounded down.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.
jump-kick.flavor_text_entries:
A strong jumping kick. May
miss and hurt the kicker.

twineedle.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target.
twineedle.flavor_text_entries:
Jabs the foe twice
using stingers.

disable.effect_entries: Disables the target's last used move, preventing its use for 4–7 turns, selected at random, or until the target leaves the field.  If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed,  if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, or if it already has a move disabled, this move will fail.
disable.flavor_text_entries:
Per quattro turni impedisce al bersaglio
di riutilizzare l’ultima mossa usata.

mega-drain.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

guillotine.effect_entries:
Inflicts damage equal to the target's max HP.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This move's accuracy is 30% plus 1% for each level the user is higher than the target.  If the user is a lower level than the target, this move will fail.

Because this move inflicts a specific and finite amount of damage, endure still prevents the target from fainting.

The effects of lock on, mind reader, and no guard still apply, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  However, they will not give this move a chance to break through detect or protect.

thunder-shock.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
thunder-shock.flavor_text_entries:
An attack that may
cause paralysis.

hyper-beam.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

psybeam.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target.
psybeam.flavor_text_entries:
The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may
also leave the target confused.

rolling-kick.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.

flamethrower.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
flamethrower.flavor_text_entries:
An attack that may
inflict a burn.

thunderbolt.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
thunderbolt.flavor_text_entries:
An attack that may
cause paralysis.

comet-punch.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

hydro-pump.flavor_text_entries:
The target is blasted by a huge volume
of water launched under great pressure.

splash.effect_entries:
Does nothing.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

flail.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power varies inversely with the user's proportional remaining HP.

64 * current HP / max HP | Power
-----------------------: | ----:
 0– 1                    |  200
 2– 5                    |  150
 6–12                    |  100
13–21                    |   80
22–42                    |   40
43–64                    |   20
flail.flavor_text_entries:
Stronger if the
user's HP is low.

bounce.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  User bounces high into the air for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.

During the immune turn, gust, hurricane, sky uppercut, smack down, thunder, and twister still hit the user normally.  gust and twister also have double power against the user.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during the immune turn.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
bounce.flavor_text_entries:
Bounces up, then down the
next turn. May paralyze.

ice-beam.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target.
ice-beam.flavor_text_entries:
An attack that may
freeze the foe.

razor-wind.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

growl.effect_entries: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

poison-sting.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target.
poison-sting.flavor_text_entries:
An attack that may
poison the target.

pin-missile.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

bite.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
bite.flavor_text_entries:
An attack that may
cause flinching.

mist.effect_entries:
Pokémon on the user's side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns.

guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used.

defog used by an opponent will end this effect.

peck.flavor_text_entries: Greift das Ziel mit dem Schnabel oder Horn an.

solar-beam.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

During sunny day, the charge turn is skipped.

During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, power is halved.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

acid.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
acid.flavor_text_entries:
An attack that may
lower DEFENSE.

amnesia.effect_entries: Raises the user's Special Defense by two stages.

destiny-bond.effect_entries:
If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint.  End-of-turn damage is ignored.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
destiny-bond.flavor_text_entries:
The foe faints if
the user does.

charm.effect_entries: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.

ember.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
ember.flavor_text_entries:
An attack that may
inflict a burn.

blizzard.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target.

During hail, this move has 100% accuracy.  It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
blizzard.flavor_text_entries:
An attack that may
freeze the foe.

roar.effect_entries:
Switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon selected at random.  Wild battles end immediately.

Doesn't affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
roar.flavor_text_entries:
Scares wild foes
to end battle.

leech-seed.effect_entries:
Plants a seed on the target that drains 1/8 of its max HP at the end of every turn and heals the user for the amount taken.  Has no effect on grass Pokémon.  The seed remains until the target leaves the field.

The user takes damage instead of being healed if the target has liquid ooze.

rapid spin will remove this effect.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
leech-seed.flavor_text_entries:
Steals HP from the
foe on every turn.

absorb.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

surf.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.

If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.

zen-headbutt.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
zen-headbutt.flavor_text_entries:
The user focuses its
willpower to its head
and rams the foe.
It may also make the
target flinch.

bide.effect_entries:
User waits for two turns.  On the second turn, the user inflicts twice the damage it accumulated on the last Pokémon to hit it.  Damage inflicted is typeless.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

protect.effect_entries:
No moves will hit the user for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

lock on, mind reader, and no guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

The following effects are not prevented by this move:

* acupressure from an ally
* curse's curse effect
* Delayed damage from doom desire and future sight; however, these moves will be prevented if they are used this turn
* feint, which will also end this move's protection after it hits
* imprison
* perish song
* shadow force
* Moves that merely copy the user, such as transform or psych up

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
protect.flavor_text_entries:
Foils attack that
turn. It may fail.

hidden-power.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's IVs.

Power is given by `x * 40 / 63 + 30`.  `x` is obtained by arranging bit 1 from the IV for each of Special Defense, Special Attack, Speed, Defense, Attack, and HP in that order.  (Bit 1 is 1 if the IV is of the form `4n + 2` or `4n + 3`.  `x` is then 64 * Special Defense IV bit 1, plus 32 * Special Attack IV bit 1, etc.)

Power is always between 30 and 70, inclusive.  Average power is 49.5.

Type is given by `y * 15 / 63`, where `y` is similar to `x` above, except constructed from bit 0.  (Bit 0 is 1 if the IV is odd.)  The result is looked up in the following table.

Value | Type
----: | --------
    0 | fighting
    1 | flying
    2 | poison
    3 | ground
    4 | rock
    5 | bug
    6 | ghost
    7 | steel
    8 | fire
    9 | water
   10 | grass
   11 | electric
   12 | psychic
   13 | ice
   14 | dragon
   15 | dark

This move thus cannot be normal.  Most other types have an equal 1/16 chance to be selected, given random IVs.  However, due to the flooring used here, bug, fighting, and grass appear 5/64 of the time, and dark only 1/64 of the time.
hidden-power.flavor_text_entries:
The power varies
with the POKéMON.

growth.effect_entries: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.  During sunny day, raises both stats by two stages.

razor-leaf.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
razor-leaf.flavor_text_entries:
Has a high criti­
cal hit ratio.

swift.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

mud-slap.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

tail-whip.effect_entries: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.
tail-whip.flavor_text_entries: Agita la cola para bajar la Defensa del equipo rival.

thunder-wave.flavor_text_entries:
A move that may
cause paralysis.

earthquake.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.

If the target is in the first turn of dig, this move will hit with double power.
earthquake.flavor_text_entries:
Tough but useless
vs. flying foes.

counter.effect_entries:
Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a physical move this turn.  Inflicts twice the damage that move did to the user.  If there is no eligible target, this move will fail.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.

sing.flavor_text_entries:
May cause the foe
to fall asleep.

toxic.effect_entries: Badly poisons the target.  Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.
toxic.flavor_text_entries:
Poisons the foe with an
intensifying toxin.

thunder.effect_entries:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.

During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy.  It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.

During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
thunder.flavor_text_entries:
An attack that may
cause paralysis.

aurora-beam.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage.
aurora-beam.flavor_text_entries:
An attack that may
lower ATTACK.

bubble-beam.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
bubble-beam.flavor_text_entries:
An attack that may
lower SPEED.
